The quote was originally delivered by Pr: 2012, addressing the death of U.S. ambassador Chris Stevens and others in the Benghazi attack.
The claim was republished by Truth Revol: linking it to President Obama's alleged disregard for free speech.
The quote was presented out of context: as it was part of a broader speech where President Obama listed various groups and ideas that he believed the future should not belong to, including those who target Coptic Christians in Egypt and those who bully women.
The full speech can be accessed on the W: allowing readers to verify the context and authenticity of the quote.
